name: Black Lite
description:
Black Lite. The gaming app that will test your ability to move through darkness.
It is hard to find the right path when you journey through the dark. Sometimes you have to let you light shine from within to find the open door.

The objective for this game is simple. Venture through the obstacle without running into walls. See if you have what it takes to collect the orbs without crashing the course.

Download today!
